identity.name: Director's Cut
principles: Fusion: Notion's utility + Linear's aesthetic + Cinema's drama
Contrast: High signal-to-noise ratio. Content pops, UI recedes.
Tension: Sharp containers vs. Pill buttons.
Depth: Layered glassmorphism over deep matte backgrounds.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Big metrics

usage.tag_default: bg-zinc-800 text-zinc-300 font-mono text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded-sm

visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Use subtle noise textures or glows.
visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise overlay on the main background if possible.

buttons.primary: h-10 px-6 rounded-full bg-lime-400 text-black font-bold hover:scale-105 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: h-10 px-6 rounded-full bg-zinc-800 text-white hover:bg-zinc-700 border border-white/5

cards.style: bg-zinc-900/40 border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-white/10 transition-colors group relative overflow-hidden
cards.hover_effect: Add a glow effect on hover using 'group-hover:opacity-100' on a nested absolute div.

inputs.style: bg-zinc-950/50 border-white/10 focus:border-lime-400/50 focus:ring-lime-400/20 rounded-md h-11

images.description: Abstract cubes - Use for Dashboard Welcome/Empty State
Abstract ribbons - Use for Ideas Page Header
Wavy ribbons - Use for Calendar subtle background

setup: Install missing dependencies: `yarn add recharts @hello-pangea/dnd date-fns` (for charts and kanban)
Ensure Tailwind config extends the colors: primary: '#bef264', surface: '#18181b'
Add the Google Fonts import to `src/index.css` immediately.
layout_rules: Use a fixed Sidebar on the left (w-64) for desktop, collapsible for mobile.
Main content area must have `max-w-7xl mx-auto` to prevent stretching on huge screens.
Dashboard must use the 'Bento Grid' layout: Mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 cards.
component_overrides: Shadcn Card: Remove default shadow, add `border-white/5`.
Shadcn Button: Change default radius to `rounded-full` for a modern feel.
Shadcn Calendar: Style selected date with `bg-lime-400 text-black`.
functionality_notes: Since there is no Auth, hardcode a 'User Profile' in the state/context.
Use LocalStorage or a simple MongoDB fetch for persistence.

general: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid deep colors.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast is at least 4.5:1.
